snippet.title: HITMAN 2 – Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
400+ Challenges
100+ Hours of Gameplay
6 Sandbox Locations 

In #HITMAN’s World of Assassination, that's just the beginning.


To learn more about HITMAN 2, please visit www.Hitman.com or join the HITMAN conversation on:
Twitter (@Hitman)  
Facebook (@Hitman)  
Instagram (@Hitman_Official)
YouTube (Hitman)  
Twitch (Hitman)
Discord (Hitman)
